channel.title: also on Blockchain Daily
channel.description: Recent content in also on Blockchain Daily

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-01-20
item.description: Opera launches a dedicated crypto browser (2 minute read) Opera has launched a web3 Crypto Browser that features a built-in crypto wallet, easy access to exchanges, support for decentralized apps, a secure clipboard that other apps can’t view, and more.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-01-10
item.description: Next Up for Chainlink in 2022: LINK Staking and ‘Internet of Blockchains’ (5 minute read) Chainlink’s ecosystem now has more than 1,000 project integrations, with 700 oracle networks securing over $75 billion in value.
